Description:
Detects suspicious execution of 'Powercfg.exe' to change lock screen timeout

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Powercfg Execution To Change Lock Screen Timeout
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '%/setacvalueindex %' and command like '%scheme_current%' and command like '%sub_video%' and command like '%videoconlock%') and (command like '%-change %' and command like '%-standby-timeout-%')) and (process_path like '%\powercfg.exe' and original_file_name = 'powercfg.exe'))
